author: 0xrajeev
content:
Hi Folks. Some of you (may know someone who) may be interested in an upcoming bootcamp for smart contract security auditing. This is funded by an EF ESP grant and sponsor partnerships with ConsenSys Diligence, Sigma Prime and Trail of Bits. Please consider taking a look and spreading the word.

See: https://twitter.com/0xRajeev/status/1416793642182737920
